mapper.select:
select ci.id, ci.staff_id, ci.title, ci.content, ci.address, ci.images, ci.start_time, ci.end_time, ci.staff_ids, ci.organizer, ci.status, ci.create_date from conference_info ci where 1 = 1
AND ci.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{conferenceInfo.title},'%')
AND ci.address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{conferenceInfo.address},'%')
order by ci.create_date desc
